column1: Con un conteo de partes de 101 piezas, este set no es el que menos piezas tiene de la serie de los sets individuales de los Nexo Knights. Curiosamente, cuenta con m&aacute
column2: s piezas de detalle que otros, que solo se enfocaron a su base y alguna que otra parte de soporte de armas.

column1: La minifigura incluida es Macy, guerrera que prefiere armas de golpes contundentes, como un mazo e incluso un lanza-proyectiles con un sistema muy interesante. Macy cuenta con dos caras impresas en su cabeza. Un punto muy importante que hay que mencionar, es la coleta de cabello que han incluido. Es de un pl&aacute
column2: stico blando, lo suficiente para sentir la textura, pero lo suficientemente r&iacute
column3: gido para conservar su forma si se manipula con fuerza. Su armadura es muy similar a la de los dem&aacute
column4: s Nexo Knights, solo que en color rojo y el casco, como se los comentaba, tiene una coleta que le da un toque femenino muy bien pensado.

column3: s. Lo que cambia en todo caso es el arma que va montada en uno de los dos puestos y los escudos proporcionados. En este caso, el arma secundaria solo es un hacha, ya que el 3er Power Up, utiliza el lanza proyectiles solo con diferente munici&oacute

column1:
,TRUE,4,4,4,5,4 Japanbuilder","2017-04-26T00:31:28.277Z","She's got a hammer! Watch out! ","

The daughter of King Halbert and Queen Hama Halbert
column2: comes to us in ultimate form! Is she still worth it? Let&#39

column1: We get the usual fare here. A nice box design focusing on our protagonist. The colors are bright and the shot is very appealing.
Inside you will find one manual, two bags
You will get so many 1x1 round studs in red and green you may be at a loss as to how to use them all up in other things. We get the silver triangular slope
column2: piece introduced for NEXO Knights as well as vine pieces, two golden bars and the ever useful NEXO&nbsp
column3: crate. In addition you get 3 NEXO powers. Considering this ends up looking the simplest of the Ultimate sets it sure packs a lot of parts. Oh, and lets not forget that trans-red armor piece. Good stuff.&nbsp

column1: When you are done, you will have these parts lying about, though maybe more red
column2: 1x1 pieces if you swap out the armory on Macy. that is a lot of 1x1s!

column1: We get the one and only Macy Halbert in this set and boy she is a thing to behold. The color choices here are outstanding. The print work on her torso, hips and legs is beyond compare and extends to the back as well. Year one of NEXO totally took me by surprise and this type of minifigure is the reason why. The detailing is so fantastic.
In addition Macy has a duel sided head piece. One with her confident smile(which shows off her chipped tooth) and the other her battle-worn look. I like her smiling face the best.
Once clad in armor and armaments she looks simply stunning!
Once completed you will have Macy sporting a side cannon and like all of these sets an armory,
column2: she can swap out the NEXO powers and wield the appropriate armory weapon that corresponds to that power.&nbsp

column1: This particular armory is probably the simplest looking of the lot but somehow feels fitting to our character. All of these powers are decently useful in the companion app but then again much depends on your play style.

After reviewing all of the main knights in the line this is probably my favorite one. Her persona is quirky but compared to the other knights she is probably the most stable one of the bunch. Her bright red color scheme along with the dragon print on her armor will be a draw for
If you are a fan of the line or associated media then this set is a total must have!

column13: > Macy is one of my all-time favorite characters from the theme because of her design and the fact that she represents the first female knight in LEGO history. We&rsquo
column14: ve had Princess characters before and a few female Ninja in the old Castle Ninja Theme, but we&rsquo
column15: ve never seen a female knight, not even in the CMF line of Minifigures. So it&rsquo
column16: s great to get her in such a cheap set.

column9: t mention the word Ultimate anywhere on the package. It&rsquo
column10: s just Macy at the top in the character specific colouring. The front shows the set very nicely with all of the features, the back instructs you on how to use the set with the App to get full advantage of the unique Nexo powers in the set.

column8: >Macy: Standing out in a rich red armour with impressive torso and leg printing Macy is a great looking figure, her clear red visor and armour looks nice and her unique ponytail sticking out of the top of the helmet completes the overall look of her in a great way. A shame she didn&rsquo
column9: t include a unique hair piece for when she&rsquo

column8: >She includes two expressions, a spunky looking smirk with a gap-toothed detail and a smudged looking determined expression for when she&rsquo
column9: s really getting into the battle against the lava monsters.

column8: >This display stand is standard for the LEGO Nexo Knights. Instead of featuring transparent parts unique to each figure, like the armour, you have a pretty bland looking angled gray piece that resembles a shield. It&rsquo
column9: s ok for what it is though and the display stand works well.

column8: >Mace Rain: The main Nexo Power gives Macy a massive multiple stud shooter on her back and features a large mace weapon with brick built parts. The mace is awesome with five of those little 1x1 tip pieces, or crown-like pieces for turrets in micro-builds, and the stud shooter makes for a great standing assault weapon when not attached to her back.

>Phoenix Blaze: Her second Nexo Power is a flaming weapon, built out of some nifty pearl gold pieces some from Legends of Chima, this weapon is equally impressive. You can keep the stud shooter attached to add more play value.
>Jungle Dragon: The last Nexo Power is a bit of an oddity, she is given two vine pieces to hold and switches her red studs for green studs, it&rsquo
column10: s firing from her launcher now. There&rsquo
column11: s also a nice clear orange topped treasure chest to hold all of the extra studs for the launcher, or at least six of them.

column9: d say this is the best offering in the first Series I&rsquo
column10: ve gotten so far, it features an impressive looking Minifigure for a cheap price, which is a fan favorite character, and includes a lot of play value outside of the App with the massive stud launcher weapon and the numerous brick-built weapons. Strongly recommended.
